description:
This modules provides a set of functions to modify a collection and retrieve the items contained in a particular collection.

Please refer to our documentation for more information about the lifecycle management and the manipulation of such collections.
authors: <xqdoc:author xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis</xqdoc:author>

functions.name: apply-insert-after
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $target as item(), $content as item()*) as item()* external
functions.description: This function does the same thing as insert-after() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.
functions.summary: This function does the same thing as insert-after() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The item in the collection after which $content will be inserted.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: The sequence of items that have been inserted.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0011 if $target is not in the collection.

functions.name: apply-insert-before
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $target as item(), $content as item()*) as item()* external
functions.description: This function does the same thing as insert-before() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.
functions.summary: This function does the same thing as insert-before() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The item in the collection before which $content will be inserted.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: The sequence of items that have been inserted.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: apply-insert-first
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $content as item()*) as item()* external
functions.description: This function does the same thing as insert-first() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.
functions.summary: This function does the same thing as insert-first() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: The sequence of items that have been inserted.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: apply-insert-last
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $content as item()*) as item()* external
functions.description: This function does the same thing as insert-last() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.
functions.summary: This function does the same thing as insert-last() except it immediately applies the resulting pending updates and returns the items that have been inserted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: The sequence of items that have been inserted.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: collection-name
functions.description:
Gets the name of the collection the given item (node or JSON item) belongs
 to.
functions.summary: Gets the name of the collection the given item (node or JSON item) belongs to.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item for which to get the name of the collection.

returns.description: The name of the collection to which $item belongs.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0011 if $item does not belong to a collection.

functions.name: collection
functions.description: Gets the sequence of nodes or JSON items from a collection.
functions.summary: Gets the sequence of nodes or JSON items from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection.

returns.description: The sequence contained in the given collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: collection
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $skip as xs:integer) as item()* external
functions.description: Gets the sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection.
functions.summary: Gets the sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The number of collection items to skip.

returns.description: The sub-sequence contained in the given collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: collection
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $start as xs:anyURI, $skip as xs:integer) as item()* external
functions.description: Gets the sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection. The parameters $start and $skip can be used to skip over items at the beginning of the collection. If both are given, both are applied: first, $start to skip to that item and then $skip to skip that additional number of items.
functions.summary: Gets the sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: A reference to the first item to return.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: The additional number of items to skip.

returns.description: The sub-sequence from the given collection.

errors: zerr:ZAPI0028 If the given URI is not a valid node position computed by the np:node-position function.
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZSTR0066 If $start does not reference a node from the collection $name.

functions.name: delete-first
functions.description: Deletes the first item from a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes the first item from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to delete from.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the first item from the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0011 if the collection is empty.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: delete-first
functions.description: Deletes the first N items from a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes the first N items from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to delete from.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number of items to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the items from the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0011 if the collection contains less than $number items.

functions.name: delete-last
functions.description: Deletes the last item from a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes the last item from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to delete from.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the last item from the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0011 if the collection is empty.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: delete-last
functions.description: Deletes the last N items from a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes the last N items from a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to delete from.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number of items to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the last N items.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0011 if the collection contains less than $number items.

functions.name: delete
functions.description: Deletes items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes items (nodes or JSON items) from a collection.

parameters.name: items
parameters.description: The items in the collection to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the items from their collections.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0011 if any item in $items is not a member of a collection or not all items belong to the same collection.

functions.name: edit
functions.description:
Edits the first supplied item so as to make it look exactly like a copy of
 the second supplied item while retaining its original identity.
functions.summary: Edits the first supplied item so as to make it look exactly like a copy of the second supplied item while retaining its original identity.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The target item to be edited.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The item that serves as an edit goal.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, performs the edit.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection to which $target belongs is not available.
zerr:ZDDY0006 if the collection to which $target belongs is append-only, const, or queue.
zerr:ZDDY0017 if $target is not a member of a collection.
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0037 if the collection is append-only.</xqdoc:error>
<xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0038 if the collection is a queue.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0039 if $target is not a root.
zerr:ZDDY0040 if $target cannot be updated to match the content (for example, because the target is a node and the content is an object).

functions.name: index-of
functions.description:
Gets the position of the given item (node or JSON item) within its
 collection.
functions.summary: Gets the position of the given item (node or JSON item) within its collection.

parameters.name: item
parameters.description: The item to get the index of.

returns.description: The position of $item in its collection.

errors: zerr:ZDDY0011 if $item does not belong to a collection.

functions.name: insert-after
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $pos as item(), $content as item()*) external
functions.description:
Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items)
 into a collection at the position directly following the given target item.
functions.summary: Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items) into a collection at the position directly following the given target item.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, inserts the items into the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0011 if $target is not in the collection.

functions.name: insert-before
functions.signature: ($name as xs:QName, $target as item(), $content as item()*) external
functions.description:
Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items)
 into a collection at the position directly preceding the given target item.
functions.summary: Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items) into a collection at the position directly preceding the given target item.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: The item in the collection before which $content will be inserted.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, inserts the items into the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
zerr:ZDDY0011 if $target is not in the collection.

functions.name: insert-first
functions.description:
Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items)
 at the beginning of the collection.
functions.summary: Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items) at the beginning of the collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, inserts the items into the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: insert-last
functions.description:
Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items)
 at the end of the collection.
functions.summary: Inserts copies of the given items (nodes or JSON items) at the end of the collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection to insert into.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The sequence of items whose copies to insert.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, inserts the items into the collection.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>

functions.name: truncate
functions.description: Deletes the entire contents of a collection.
functions.summary: Deletes the entire contents of a collection.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the collection whose contents to delete.

returns.description: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the contents.

errors: <xqdoc:error xmlns:xqdoc="http://www.xqdoc.org/1.0">zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection is not available.</xqdoc:error>
